#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=I will also work with diplomats as well as community and religious leaders to create an atmosphere of mutual respect and understanding among the great faiths of the world , particularly , though not exclusively , between Christianity and Islam .
#Text=Finally , as noted above , I will be an advocate for new technologies and more eco-friendly ways of living that can drastically reduce our dependence on foreign oil .
#Text=Education and Healthcare .
#Text=I combine these issues because , if America is to remain a vibrant nation , our citizens must be strong and nimble when it comes to both mind and body .
#Text=I support vouchers and privatized education .
#Text=Let ’s allow the free market and competition improve the effectiveness and efficiency of our educational system .
#Text=We need to also better compensate our teachers , but we must also hold them to higher standards of excellence .
#Text=Teachers have an important , tough job , but too many have " tuned out " .
#Text=I would love our culture to evolve to the point where teaching is given the respect , admiration and financial incentives that , say , doctors and lawyers do .
#Text=We absolutely need universal health care , but the free market should remain at the helm , with private companies competing for the government ’s business .
#Text=In addition , our national healthcare program must focus on patient education , motivation and preventative health .
#Text=Treating people via the emergency room for conditions that could have easily been prevented with some attentive care , need to be eliminated .
#Text=Campaigning for the American presidency is one of the most expensive exercises in the world .
#Text=How do you deal with the cost and fundraising ?
#Text=The fact that it costs so much to run for President should alarm every American .
#Text=The huge sums of money required to be a viable candidate only serve to keep politics and politicians focused on money , and those who provide it and the special interest they represent .
#Text=I am hoping to rely on my own creativity and that of my supporters to get our message out .
#Text=With any luck , our " untainted " message will breakthrough .
#Text=I 'm not foolish enough to expect that this will be easy , or that it ’s likely .
#Text=But my longing for a different kind of politics , and a different kind of politician keeps me hopeful .
#Text=Do you have a running mate yet ?
#Text=Who are they ?
#Text=What are you looking for in a running mate ?
#Text=I do not have a running mate , but I am seeking nominations on my website ( kissing4prez.org ) .
#Text=I ’m looking for someone who shares my fundamental belief that politics as usual needs to go , and fast .

#Text=I am looking for someone with a proven track record in generating creative thoughts and solutions ; someone who is open-minded and willing to make compromises ; some who is hopeful and optimistic .

#Text=Since my campaign does n't have a significant budget , I would love to have a vice-presidential candidate who has some forum , be that via celebrity , a popular blog or even just being in a band .
#Text=Personally , I would love to have a candidate who is a person of color , and , ideally , a non-Christian .
#Text=In fact , I would be most pleased to have a Muslim on my ticket .
